title.native: 異世界ワンターンキル姉さん ～姉同伴の異世界生活はじめました～
title.romaji: Isekai One Turn Kill Nee-san: Ane Douhan no Isekai Seikatsu Hajimemashita

description:
Asahi loves the idea of magical fantasy worlds. And somehow, he’s transported to one! He’s eager to explore and use his new abilities, except he learns he doesn’t have any. But his older sister Maya is in this world too, and she ends up having the strongest cheat skills imaginable! Now, Asahi starts his new life with a doting sister who can kill any beast with one hit.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Each episode streamed 24 hours early on ABEMA.
synonyms: One Turn Kill พี่สาวจ้าวต่างโลก: เริ่มต้นชีวิตร่วมเดินทางต่างโลกกับพี่สาว

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Crossover
tags.description: Centers around the placement of two or more otherwise discrete fictional characters, settings, or universes into the context of a single story.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Shogi
tags.description: Centers around the game of shogi.

title.native: 異世界ワンターンキル姉さん ～姉同伴の異世界生活はじめました～

node.description:
[Website](https://trysail.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/trysail_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI2in6tTAjsaqzdeOeWZkQ) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/trysail_official_goods/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3YmAt9U9INQwxAwfgMVfKD)

A seiyuu girl group belonging to Music Ray'n agency under Sony Music Japan. They also host A&G+ Radio "TriAngle Harmony" together.

__Members:__
• [Momo Asakura](https://anilist.co/staff/118479/Momo-Asakura)
• [Sora Amamiya](https://anilist.co/staff/116517/Sora-Amamiya)
• [Shiina Natsukawa](https://anilist.co/staff/118818/Shiina-Natsukawa)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/VALIS_Official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/valis.official/) | [Youtube ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0uRc5HF-rFDEQ7lmNYKEw)__

__VALIS__ is a virtual circus group consisting of 6 virtual artists; __MYU__, __CHINO__, __NINA__, __NEFFY__, __RARA__, and __VITTE__. The Circus is managed by Sought.
They have an appearance like a doll with cat ears and a tail. They performed in both Avatar (Virtual) and Origin (Reality), switching back-and-forth between dimensions.

(Source: KAMITSUBAKI Wiki)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/pon_oresama) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/oresama_pon/)__

Pon is a member of the duo [ORESAMA](https://anilist.co/staff/146391).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/857636909861920768)

Returned to the industry in August 2020, after having previously retired in 2014.
